text: Rainbow jersey The Women's omnium at the 2011 UCI Track Cycling World Championships was held on March 26 and 27. 24 athletes participated in the contest. There were six events held. ==Results== ===Flying Lap=== The Flying Lap was held at 12:20. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- ! Rank !! Name !! Nation !! Time !!
